feed.title: Novus Dominatus
feed.subtitle: In the year 2050, Novus Dominatus is an extreterressial nation residing upon dwarf planet Makemake.

entry.title: Official Release of Novus Dominatus’ New Website

link.title: Official Release of Novus Dominatus’ New Website

entry.content:
Novus Dominatus is now under reconstruction, beginning with the creation of a new website.

Updated to the newest static serving technology, it is ready to serve you in information-gathering.

The Constitution is being rewritten as well.
entry.summary: Novus Dominatus is now under reconstruction, beginning with the creation of a new website.
